user_query: I want to organize a team-building retreat in the mountains with thrilling activities, cozy lodge accommodation, and calculate carbon footprint for travel.

TaskList.description: Research and recommend a list of thrilling outdoor activities suitable for team-building in mountain areas.
Compile a list of available cozy lodges that offer comfortable accommodations, a conference room, and a scenic view.
Calculate the carbon footprint of the team's air travel based on the number of participants and travel distance.
Suggest various ways to offset the calculated carbon footprint from the air travel.
